about.details:
Ekennis Software Service Ltd is engaged in the business of software IT solution and consulting services, IT product/ software development, and software training, ERP solution, Learning Management Solution, 3D printing, Digital printing and packaging design consultancy. It also provides business process analysis, system design, technical expertise, implementation, training, and support services, and has expertise in SAP ERP.

  1. IT Solutions: Ekennis Software is a ERP solution provider organizing solution implementation in SAP, Oracle, and Microsoft.
  2. 3D and Digital Printing: It provides 3D printing and packaging services for retail, food, entertainment, sport, babycare, personal & hygiene, industrial, and agriculture industries.

Competitive strengths

  • Experienced promoters and employee base.
  • One stop shop for managed business solutions to diversified customer base.
  • E-learning, mobile learning solutions, and EATS (Ekennis Application Tracking System) for staffing solutions.
  • Latest technology usage for digital printing.
  • Cost advantage and product differentiation strategy.

faqs.question: What is the Ekennis Software IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ekennis Software IPO is a SME IPO of 400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.88 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹72 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 21, 2022, and closes on February 24, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ekennis Software IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ekennis Software IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ekennis Software IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ekennis Software IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ekennis Software IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ekennis Software IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ekennis Software IPO opens on February 21, 2022 and closes on February 24, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ekennis Software IPO?
faqs.answer: Ekennis Software IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,15,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ekennis Software IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ekennis Software IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Ekennis Software IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Ekennis Software IPO will be done on Wednesday, March 2, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, March 4, 2022. Check the Ekennis Software IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Ekennis Software IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Ekennis Software IPO listing date is on Monday, March 7, 2022.
